title: Very nice walking street
review: Good place for morning walk and nature wind

title: Jogging & Morning walks
review: Astha Path is famous morning walk & joggers spot which makes it a very nice & a must visit place. It is very nicely maintained.

title: Nor well maintained
review: Since we had to attend the aarti at Triveni Ghat, we decided to visit the AsthaPath. It's a nice place to walk around and enjoy Ganga veiw, but it's not maintained well, it was very dirty, didn't feel safe either. We stayed for about ten mins and left. If it's paid attention to,this place can turn into a nice tourist hub. They should add more benches, have some kind of security

title: Beautiful
review: This is a beautiful place.  You can enjoy walking on this very well maintained path and it is most enjoyable time spent in Rishikesh.

title: good levelled road
review: only if this place had been maintained well over the years, it would have been a fantastic place for casual walks/ strolls along the ganges.
